ModMetaData.name: Fairy Lamp
ModMetaData.author: AngleWyrm
ModMetaData.description:
Add-on for More Monsters mod
Adds a lantern to the game that is powered by fairy dust
It's built using 5 metal + 2 fairy dust Forest fairies produce enough dust to support up to five lanterns each Has a tank that can hold fuel enough for a whole season -- 3 fairy dust Costs about 50 silver and 20 seconds in labor
